title: TRADED: Cy Young Glove Shows Cycle 460 PSA 4
author: bundy462

posts.post_title: TRADED: Cy Young Glove Shows Cycle 460 PSA 4
posts.post_content:
I'm interested in selling or trading my Young Cycle 460 back. In trade scenarios, I'm looking for PSA or SGC HOFers in grade 1, 1.5, 2, or 2.5.

I ship via USPS priority mail in a box with insurance and tracking with signature required. 

Update: Gone, card has been traded.
